mapper.sql: MSG_SEQ AS msgSeq, USER_ID AS userId, MSG_RECV_ID AS msgRecvId, MSG_CONT AS msgCont, TO_CHAR(REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS regDt, MSG_READ_YN AS msgReadYn
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MSG ( msg_seq, user_id, msg_recv_id, msg_cont, reg_dt, msg_read_yn ) VALUES ( #{msgSeq}, #{userId}, #{msgRecvId}, #{msgCont}, SYSDATE, #{msgReadYn} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MSG SET MSG_READ_YN = '읽음' WHERE msg_seq = #{msgSeq} AND MSG_READ_YN = '읽지않음'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM MSG WHERE msg_recv_id = #{msgRecvId} AND msg_read_yn = '읽지않음'
SELECT FROM MSG ORDER BY MSG_READ_YN DESC, REG_DT DESC
mapper.update:
MERGE INTO MSG T1 USING ( SELECT #{msgSeq} AS MSG_SEQ , #{userId} AS USER_ID , #{msgRecvId} AS MSG_RECV_ID , #{msgCont} AS MSG_CONT , SYSDATE AS REG_DT , #{msgReadYn} AS MSG_READ_YN FROM DUAL
)T2 ON (T1.USER_ID = T2.USER_ID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T1.MSG_SEQ = T2.MSG_SEQ ,T1.USER_ID = T2.USER_ID ,T1.MSG_RECV_ID = T2.MSG_RECV_ID ,T1.MSG_CONT= T2.MSG_CONT ,T1.REG_DT= T2.REG_DT ,T1.MSG_READ_YN = T2.MSG_READ_YN WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (T1.MSG_SEQ,T1.USER_ID,T1.MSG_RECV_ID,T1.MSG_CONT,T1.REG_DT,T1.MSG_READ_YN) VALUES (T2.MSG_SEQ,T2.USER_ID,T2.MSG_RECV_ID,T2.MSG_CONT,T2.REG_DT,T2.MSG_READ_YN)
